[[User:Blackmetalbaz|Blackmetalbaz]] ([[User talk:Blackmetalbaz|talk]]) 14:35, 19 August 2009 (UTC) == [[Dale Bozzio]] == On June 23, you deleted much of Dale Bozzio's Personal Life information, but left the references. Shortly thereafter, the editor who had originally entered the information that you deleted reinserted the same information in a shortened write-up. At the point that the editor reentered the information, it was public knowledge that Ms. Bozzio had filed an appeal in the U.S. court system. Since this is an encyclopedia, and since entries are not obviously dated as are newspaper articles, the provided information has been misleading, and in my opinion, has given Ms. Bozzio's page the status of that of a tabloid. I am a new editor, and I am still learning how to edit. I do agree with your June 23 comment in the history tab of Ms. Bozzio's page. Possibly an item by item edit with consensus gained along the way could result in her page being brought, in my opinion, into conformance with Wikipedia guidelines in general, and in particular, for biographies of living persons? As a start, the result of a search engine search for Dale Bozzio's Wikipedia page results in the following: "Dale Bozzio - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Career|Solo album|New album|Personal life Dale Bozzio's life is so strange The Boston Phoenix April 24, 2009 ... Dale Bozzio sentenced to jail The Boston Phoenix May 27, 2009 ... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dale Bozzio - Cached" That information is outdated, and I believe, inappropriate for an artist whose career has spanned 30 some-odd years. I think that it should be revised to the following: "Dale Bozzio - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Career|Solo album|New album|Personal life Dale Bozzio is an American musician and former Playboy Bunny. She became famous as the lead singer for the '80s pop/new wave band Missing Persons. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dale Bozzio - Cached" Do you know how to revise that information? [[User:Doc2234|Doc2234]] ([[User talk:Doc2234|talk]]) 20:26, 19 August 2009 (UTC) *Thanks for your note. I didn't know that some of that miscellaneous detail had been reinstated, but fortunately the IP was somewhat conservative. According to [[WP:BLP]], the relevant guideline for the biography of a living person, tells me the following: "Biographies of living persons must be written conservatively, with regard for the subject's privacy. Wikipedia is an encyclopedia, not a tabloid paper; it is not our job to be sensationalist, or to be the primary vehicle for the spread of titillating claims about people's lives." I take that to mean that an arrest (see the history of [[Alex Da Silva (dancer)]], for instance) or a criminal charge is NOT notable; a conviction probably is--though if it were up to me, a singer being convicted of animal cruelty has no encyclopedic value. But I realize I'm probably fighting a losing battle, as Da Silva's history makes clear. Bozzio's article right now is OK, I guess, and most editors here would probably revert cutting what's still there.

Your question is really about how the article shows up, and I don't think I can be of much use there. I don't know which search engine you use. Her article shows up in Google as follows: "Dale also divorced Terry Bozzio at that time, but retained the name. Dale Bozzio has continued to record and perform since the breakup of Missing Persons. ..." That, it seems to me, is alright--I gather you use a different search engine? Thanks for your response, and take care, [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 02:25, 27 August 2009 (UTC) *Hey man, sorry for any incovenience on my part, there you go...[[Image:Smiley.svg|left|62px]] VASCO - --[[User:NothingButAGoodNothing|NothingButAGoodNothing]] ([[User talk:NothingButAGoodNothing|talk]]) 02:28, 27 August 2009 (UTC) **Thanks Vasco. Take it easy, [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 02:44, 27 August 2009 (UTC) *Thanks for the pic man. Beers in Portugal? Nothing special i tell you (SAGRES, SUPER BOCK are the two top brands), but when it's cold, a beer is a beer right? Happy editing!! VASCO - --[[User:NothingButAGoodNothing|NothingButAGoodNothing]] ([[User talk:NothingButAGoodNothing|talk]]) 05:05, 27 August 2009 (UTC) *Sorry, and where are my manners? Where are you from mate? Judging from the pic you sent me and your (cool) userpage, i would say the [[Netherlands]]...Is that so? Take care, until some other wiki-time!! VASCO AMARAL - --[[User:NothingButAGoodNothing|NothingButAGoodNothing]] ([[User talk:NothingButAGoodNothing|talk]]) 16:57, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ==Your Recent Edits== [[Image:Information.svg|25px]] Thank you for your contributions to Wikipedia. When using certain templates on talk pages{{#if:User talk:59.167.232.197|, as you did to [[:User talk:59.167.232.197]]}}, don't forget to [[Wikipedia:Template substitution|substitute with text]] by adding '''subst:''' to the template tag. For example, use {{subst:uw-test1}} instead of {{uw-test1}}. This reduces server load and prevents accidental blanking of the template. {{#if:|{{{2}}}|Thank you.}} (I'm pretty sure you already know this but just in case...) -'''[[User:Fastily|FASTILY]]''' [[User talk:Fastily|(TALK)]] 02:58, 27 August 2009 (UTC) *The whole subst thing has been explained to me once or twice but I'm just not smart enough for it; I didn't know it was necessary in these vandalism warnings. You know, I've dropped hundreds, if not thousands of them all over the place... I'll do my best. Thanks, [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 03:04, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::Use Twinkle and Friendly for tagging. Seriously. Under the Gadgets pane at [[Special:Preferences]]. [[User talk:Bongomatic|Bongo]][[Special:Contributions/Bongomatic|matic]] 03:08, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::WHY??? I don't want to be like the rest! [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 03:15, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::I used to be the same Drmies, but as soon as you start adding the "subst" for vandalism warnings, you get used to it. Trust me. I spent about eight weeks just doing the {{uw-vandalism1}} tag without the "subst"./ i'm sure you'd get the hang of it--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 03:59, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::::Well, I got this Twinkle thing now, and it feels strangely empowering. It's almost too easy! [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 04:01, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::::You may soon reconsider declining adminship nomination. [[User talk:Bongomatic|Bongo]][[Special:Contributions/Bongomatic|matic]] 04:06, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::::::Yeah man, don't be a wuss. I'll consider supporting depending on how you respond to various interogatives. [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 04:30, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::::::You know, I've looked at a bunch of them (RfAs, with their questions), and a lot of these questions I couldn't possibly answer. What would my mop do? Block the occasional vandal, maybe. Much of what goes on at ANI I could hack, but as soon as issues get their own page (some of you may be familiar with [[Wikipedia:Arbitration/Requests/Case/Abd-William M. Connolley/Proposed decision|this one]] it quickly goes over my head. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 04:36, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::::::::As far as I can tell the main job of admins is to block content contributors they disagree with, so I think you'll be a perfect fit. :) [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 05:18, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::::::::::The thing I really get annoyed with about admins? If an admin POV-pushes it is okay but if a regular user does it, they get blocked without delay.--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 05:34, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::::::::::Hey, I just noticed I rhymed just then.--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 05:35, 27 August 2009 (UTC) Well, I'd happily block you for that. But listen, Sky, don't listen to Child. He, I'm sure, blamed the teacher for every bad grade he ever got. Or the liberal media, no doubt. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 15:41, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :Don't forget onions. [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 16:16, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::Huh? [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 16:22, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::It's the liberal '''elite''' media, thank you very much.--[[User:Kelapstick|kelapstick]] ([[User talk:Kelapstick|talk]]) 16:55, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::::Right you are. But ONIONS? [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 16:57, 27 August 2009 (UTC) :::::Well they have started picking the onions here, maybe I will ask them.--[[User:Kelapstick|kelapstick]] ([[User talk:Kelapstick|talk]]) 17:03, 27 August 2009 (UTC) == DYK for 99 Fables == {| class="messagebox standard-talk" |- |[[Image:Updated DYK query.svg|15px|Updated DYK query]] |On [[Wikipedia:Recent_additions#August 27 2009|August 27, 2009]], '''[[:Template:Did you know|Did you know?]]''' was updated with a fact from the article '''''[[99 Fables]]''''', which you created or substantially expanded. You are welcome to check how many hits your article got while on the front page ([[User:Rjanag/Pageview stats|here's how]]) and add it to [[WP:DYKSTATS|DYKSTATS]] if it got over 5,000. If you know of another interesting fact from a recently created article, then please suggest it on the [[:Template talk:Did you know|Did you know? talk page]]. |} '''[[User:NuclearWarfare|NW]]''' ''([[User talk:NuclearWarfare|Talk]])'' 05:07, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ==[[Vermeer Dutch Chocolate Cream Liqueur]]== What do you think? And why are you still awake? I'm glad the weather is good down there. :) I guess I should come down soon? [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 05:16, 27 August 2009 (UTC) *I think that that's a really tasty drink, though too sweet for my taste, for a drink with only 17%. I've done a little work to the article. Thanks for pointing it out!

And yes, by all means, come on down. The weather is still great (last night we had a spectacular thunder storm) and football is about to start. We had bacon for breakfast and I'm still munching on the leftovers. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 15:32, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ::I missed you at the farmer's market. I got a honey chicken sandwich and then a rib sandwich. I also bought some fruit and veggies. :) Sunny and nice here by the beach. But I'm hoping to make it out there in the next couple months. [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 20:40, 27 August 2009 (UTC) == DYK for Rijksmonument == {| class="messagebox standard-talk" |- |[[Image:Updated DYK query.svg|15px|Updated DYK query]] |On [[Wikipedia:Recent_additions#August 27 2009|August 27, 2009]], '''[[:Template:Did you know|Did you know?]]''' was updated with a fact from the article '''''[[Rijksmonument]]''''', which you created or substantially expanded. You are welcome to check how many hits your article got while on the front page ([[User:Rjanag/Pageview stats|here's how]]) and add it to [[WP:DYKSTATS|DYKSTATS]] if it got over 5,000. If you know of another interesting fact from a recently created article, then please suggest it on the [[:Template talk:Did you know|Did you know? talk page]]. |} '''[[User:NuclearWarfare|NW]]''' ''([[User talk:NuclearWarfare|Talk]])'' 17:07, 27 August 2009 (UTC) ==FYI update== You guys came in at #34. [http://www.rpjsyndicate.com/2009/08/ncaa-football-preview-spectacular-celebrating-140-years-of-college-football/]. [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 20:27, 27 August 2009 (UTC) == Military jargon == [[File:Luis Figo flickr.jpg|thumb|150px|"I am [[The Last of the Famous International Playboys]]..."]] Hi MIES, VASCO here, Do you mean [[Battle of Nuremberg|this soccer]] match? Man, that was very tough and rough! Players were at it with their nerves on the edge (both teams), and with that opener from [[Khalid Boulahrouz]] on [[Cristiano Ronaldo]] (i am not criticizing the defender in any way, he's a very physical guy) all "hell broke loose", the players lost control, and the ref did the best he could. All in all, the match was very ugly man, makes you miss those [[AFC Ajax]] matches in the 90's, with the [[Louis van Gaal]]-led side, even [[Winston Bogarde]] looked like a good player (just kidding, he was...in his position that is, no one asked him to dribble and score)! Take care, send me your views on the match today if you want, i'll be "wiki-here". VASCO AMARAL - --[[User:NothingButAGoodNothing|NothingButAGoodNothing]] ([[User talk:NothingButAGoodNothing|talk]]) 23:37, 27 August 2009 (UTC) *Shoot, I didn't know it had a nickname. Yeah, that was terrible (and that foul certainly was--I figured already that that might lose us the match). BTW, I really like Figo--I even like his hair (jealousy). I didn't even know he had retired--it's not easy to keep up in the US. Listen, I remember an Ajax match from back then, with Kluivert sliding it in to beat AC Milan. That was nice. Oh, and I would never claim Bogarde was a good player, but he sure was big. Later! [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 00:32, 28 August 2009 (UTC) == Think it's worth submitting? == {{Userbox |border-c=#000 |border-s=1 |id-c=#fff |id-s=12 |id-fc=#001 |info-c=#090 |info-s=8 |info-fc=#fff |id=[[File:Led_Zeppelin_logo.png|43px]]|info='''HELL YES''' This user [[headbanging|headbangs]]}} [[User:Soxwon|Soxwon]] ([[User talk:Soxwon|talk]]) 06:12, 28 August 2009 (UTC) {{-}} *Haha, you are SO old school, banging to Zep! Go for it--though the dark green is a little too dark for me, I have to look carefully. Oh, I'd put "this" in lowercase: {{Userbox |border-c=#000 |border-s=1 |id-c=#fff |id-s=12 |id-fc=#001 |info-c=#030 |info-s=8 |info-fc=#fff |id=[[File:Led_Zeppelin_logo.png|43px]]|info='''HELL YES''' this user [[headbanging|headbangs]].}} [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 16:26, 28 August 2009 (UTC) **I've always been old school man, Led Zep, Def Leppard, Pink Floyd. I'll try it then, thnx. [[User:Soxwon|Soxwon]] ([[User talk:Soxwon|talk]]) 18:43, 28 August 2009 (UTC) ***I actually had to select the text in order to read "headbangs"...Rock on!--[[User:Kelapstick|kelapstick]] ([[User talk:Kelapstick|talk]]) 18:49, 28 August 2009 (UTC) ****Hmm, I'll change the color then. [[User:Soxwon|Soxwon]] ([[User talk:Soxwon|talk]]) 18:51, 28 August 2009 (UTC) *****The green and blue is showing up for me now, it was the black and blue...although they were both black a minute ago...--[[User:Kelapstick|kelapstick]] ([[User talk:Kelapstick|talk]]) 18:55, 28 August 2009 (UTC) Submitted, now with easier to use link: {{User:Soxwon/Userboxes}} {{User:Soxwon/Userboxes}}[[User:Soxwon|Soxwon]] ([[User talk:Soxwon|talk]]) 19:21, 28 August 2009 (UTC) *Nice--but I still think you need to lowercase 'this'--it is the third word in a sentence. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 20:30, 28 August 2009 (UTC) :Riiiight, I meant to do that, hold on... [[User:Soxwon|Soxwon]] ([[User talk:Soxwon|talk]]) 21:39, 28 August 2009 (UTC) ::I've personally never considered Led Zeppelin to be metal, but that might just be my opinion. Metal is my favorite genre so I can listen to just about anything. I can headbang to old school bands like [[Black Sabbath]], [[Death (band)|Death]], [[Iron Maiden]], [[Judas Priest]], [[Metallica]], [[Motorhead]], [[Scorpions]], [[Slayer]] , [[Soundgarden]] and others as well as new school bands like [[Alice In Chains]], [[Bullet For My Valentine]], [[Cathedral]], [[Dark Tranquillity]], [[Dimmu Borgir]], [[Disturbed]], [[DragonForce]], [[Dream Theatre]], [[Faith No More]], [[Fear Factory]], [[Godsmack]], [[Machine Head]], [[Rage Against The Machine]], [[Slipknot]], [[Tool]] and others. I also like solo acts a lot too like [[Ozzy Osborne]] and [[Rob Zombie]].--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 22:00, 28 August 2009 (UTC) :::Alright, now you can prove your allegiance with a box. I only listen to blackened death metal, so y'all a bit too weak for me. BTW, K-stick, ever listen to [[Paul Weller]]? [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 23:08, 28 August 2009 (UTC) ::::You have me wrong, I listen to just about everything, even have death metal, thrash metal and some things you've probably never heard of on my IPOD ;). [[User:Soxwon|Soxwon]] ([[User talk:Soxwon|talk]]) 23:22, 28 August 2009 (UTC) :::::Soxwon your userbox encouraged me to create a userbox of my own that I've added to my userpage. I worked with your template but made a few adjustments on mine, replacing the [[Led Zeppelin]] with the single cover of [[A Looking In View]], one of the latest singles by [[Alice In Chains]] and adjusted the info to include [[Grunge music]] with metal. {{Userbox |border-c=#000 |border-s=1 |id-c=#fff |id-s=12 |id-fc=#001 |info-c=#090 |info-s=8 |info-fc=#000 |id=[[File:NonFreeImageRemoved.svg|150px]]|info='''This user listens to [[Grunge]] and [[Heavy metal music|Heavy Metal]] music.}}''' --[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 02:00, 29 August 2009 (UTC) == HAPPY WIKIBIRTHDAY DRMIES!!!! == [[File:Balloons-aj.svg|thumb|left|Balloons for the big celebration.]] [[File:Wikipresent.jpg|thumb|right|It just wouldn't be a Wikibirthday without a Wikipresent, would it?]] [[File:Birthday cake.jpg|small|thumb|right|Mmmm yummy. Cake! Blow out all the candles!]] It's been exactly two years from this very day since your first ever edit to this Wikipedia on August 30 2007. You know what that means, don't you? ...It's your second WikiBirthday! Three cheers for Drmies! '''Hip Hip Hooray!''' Congratulations and enjoy your day! Let's hope your future years on Wikipedia are as good as the first two were...--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 05:02, 30 August 2009 (UTC) *WOW...I had no idea...thanks Sky! This is quite a surprise, as I'm in the middle of gutting [[Surf culture]] and was expecting all kinds of commentary! Thanks again man. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 05:04, 30 August 2009 (UTC) ::Wow, two years, Happy WPB-Day! [[User:Kelapstick|kelapstick]] ([[User talk:Kelapstick|talk]]) 05:21, 30 August 2009 (UTC) :::Thanks K! Kid asleep? I just sang the little one to sleep, oh yeah, I'm good. Later! [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 05:26, 30 August 2009 (UTC) ::::He's been down for three hours, been a rough week though, he isn't reacting well to the time change, and started cutting the last of his teeth. [[User:Kelapstick|kelapstick]] ([[User talk:Kelapstick|talk]]) 05:34, 30 August 2009 (UTC) You've been here that long? No wonder you're so ummm... unique. :) Hey what do you think of [[Lame Ducks]]. Norwegian Ska-Punk is automatically notable I would think, right? But some references probably wouldn't hurt. [[User:ChildofMidnight|ChildofMidnight]] ([[User talk:ChildofMidnight|talk]]) 19:26, 30 August 2009 (UTC) *Hey, I was on Conservapedia the other day but you need special permission to edit. I was merely going to add that the breast cancer rate has gone up since Nixon came into office. So I think I'm going to stick it out here, where I can mess around some. Yes, Norwegian ska-punk is highly notable, and you should try and expand that article. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 20:41, 30 August 2009 (UTC) == Question == Have you been watching CoM's recent situation?--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 02:15, 31 August 2009 (UTC) :Whoa, no, but I am now, I guess. I'm somewhat at a loss. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 02:37, 31 August 2009 (UTC) ::Everything beginning [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_talk:ChildofMidnight#Images]] has put CoM in somewhat of a bad position here.--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 02:43, 31 August 2009 (UTC) :::Yup. [[User:Drmies|Drmies]] ([[User talk:Drmies#top|talk]]) 02:44, 31 August 2009 (UTC) ::::If you are following this situation, also [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_talk:Arbitration_Committee/Noticeboard#Obama_articles:_ChildofMidnight this]--[[User:Sky Attacker|'''''The Legendary''''']][[User talk:Sky Attacker|'''''Sky Attacker''''']] 02:55, 31 August 2009 (UTC) ←Sky, I think Drmies and all others who interact on a regular basis with CoM are capable of discerning the sequence of events once they see where to start. Not sure that pointing out specific milestones on the path to the current situation will do anyone benefit. Editors make conscious whether ''to'' comment or ''not'' to comment, so continuing this discussion where the preference seems to have been expressed seems counterproductive. [[User talk:Bongomatic|Bongo]][[Special:Contributions/Bongomatic|matic]] 05:10, 31 August 2009 (UTC) {{talkarchive}}

title: User talk:Dgies/Archive 3
content:
{{Talk archive}} {{TOC right}} ==Thanks== Thank you for reverting the vandalism on my talk page. [[User:Irishguy|'''IrishGuy''']] [[User talk:Irishguy|''talk'']] 00:24, 1 April 2007 (UTC) == Anti-Colbert sentiment is not appropriate == Wikipedia needs to take into account popular culture. It is ignorant for you to delete any entry without fully considering its validity just because the source of it happens to be someone like Steven Colbert. Steven Colbert is a great man and brilliant thinker. Plus, his wife is hotter than the cyber chick you masturbate to every 16 minutes. —The preceding [[Wikipedia:Sign your posts on talk pages|unsigned]] comment was added by [[Special:Contributions/67.162.136.179|67.162.136.179]] ([[User talk:67.162.136.179|talk]]) 02:02, 1 April 2007 (UTC). == My RfA == *Thanks for the support position. However, I've decided to withdraw my acceptance because of real [[WP:CIVIL]] concerns. I will try again later when I've proven to myself and others that my anger will no longer interfere with my abilities as a Wikipedia editor. Thanks again, and I'll see you around here shortly. :) [[User:JuJube|JuJube]] 04:12, 1 April 2007 (UTC) == My RfA == Thank you for your support in my recent successful RfA. --[[User:Anthony.bradbury|Anthony.bradbury]] 14:05, 1 April 2007 (UTC) == I have semi-protected your user page... == ...for a couple days and blocked that last vandalizing account. Let me know if you want it unprotected before a couple days. —[[User:wknight94|Wknight94]] ([[User talk:wknight94|talk]]) 20:40, 1 April 2007 (UTC) == Re:Your signature is broken == It's not broken, I'm just using the easy, "fake wikilink" signature, popular a while back. --[[User:Pie Man 360 | [[User:Pie Man 360|UserPage]] [[User talk:Pie Man 360|Talk about me!]]]] 21:35, 1 April 2007 (UTC) ==Thanks== Thanks for fixing up my user page. I have no idea why I got hit with that.... --[[User:Wafulz|Wafulz]] 22:03, 1 April 2007 (UTC) == Infact... == :''Re: http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk%3A24.177.47.40&diff=118560763&oldid=117027675'' 15:44, 2 April 2007 (UTC) This is a school computer. I apologise for anything my idiotic siblings may do. --Digipatd —The preceding [[Wikipedia:Sign your posts on talk pages|unsigned]] comment was added by [[Special:Contributions/24.177.47.40|24.177.47.40]] ([[User talk:24.177.47.40|talk]]) 14:55, 2 April 2007 (UTC). == You have a fan... == Not sure where this came from... [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User:Wwwyzzerdd&diff=119811299&oldid=114527618]. -- [[User:Gogo Dodo|Gogo Dodo]] 21:21, 2 April 2007 (UTC) : It's some guy from Toronto who has been trolling me and {{ul|Meaneager}}. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 21:45, 2 April 2007 (UTC) == Thanks == For getting rid of that ASCII art on my page. --[[User:Wwwyzzerdd|Wwwyzzerdd]] 22:13, 2 April 2007 (UTC) == RfA thanks == {| class="messagebox" |- |align="center"|[[Image:Sunset_over_Melbourne.jpg|100px]] |align="left" width="100%"| Thank you for your '''Support''' on my recent [[Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/MichaelBillington 2|nomination for adminship]], which passed with a final tally of '''89/1/1'''. If there's anything I can help with, then you know [[User talk:MichaelBillington|where]] to find me. Cheers.
- [[User:MichaelBillington|Michael Billington]] ([[User talk:MichaelBillington|talk]]) 06:50, 3 April 2007 (UTC)
|} == RFA == Hey Dgies, good to know you've finally decided to take the plunge. I'll write you a nom right after lunch. :-) See ya shortly. --[[User:Husond|Hús]][[User:Husond/Esperanza|ö]][[User talk:Husond|nd]] 12:03, 4 April 2007 (UTC) :[[Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/Dgies|It's done]]! :-) Don't forget to change the Scheduled-to-end-date before launching it, and please let me know when you do so that I may support before getting too beaten. ;-) Good luck! Best regards, [[User:Husond|Hús]][[User:Husond/Esperanza|ö]][[User talk:Husond|nd]] 14:33, 4 April 2007 (UTC) ::I'd err on the side of the user, maybe a 1 day block will get him to change. Many admins started out as "vandal-only" accounts. Yes your attitude complies with policy, but I feel it's too extreme. [[User:Jeff Defender|Jeff Defender]] 17:05, 4 April 2007 (UTC) == With all due respect... == I brought up your first edit to my RfA to show how I think you found Cremepuff's pages. [[User:Xiner|Xiner]] ([[User talk:Xiner|talk]]) 18:28, 4 April 2007 (UTC) :Dgies, I never once questioned your motives in posting my edit details. [[User:Xiner|Xiner]] ([[User talk:Xiner|talk]]) 18:41, 4 April 2007 (UTC) I merged the votes. ==[[Himno de Cantabria]]== Yes, I made the translation. I know it´s very literal, in fact as you can see I wrote in the edition page this note: !--Correct translation?--. That´s all I can make with my low level of english and over all my scarce knowledge of english poetic resources. Feel free to introduce changes.--[[User:Uhanu|Uhanu]] 18:10, 1 April 2007 (UTC) Thank you very much for reword my translation, obviously it seems more natural now. On the other hand, of course I´m up to date with the article [[Cantabria/Translation]], thank you for the note :).--[[User:Uhanu|Uhanu]] 23:29, 8 April 2007 (UTC) == Reply to Speedy deletion tagging of Justice league episodes == I see you have tagged many redirects from titles of Justice League episodes with the deletion reason "''Just because it's the name of a Justice League episode should not mean that it should redirect there''". This does not appear to reflect any of the [[WP:CSD|speedy deletion criteria]]. Please don't use speedy deletion tags for things you simply think are bad. If you really think these should all be deleted, you may list them at [[WP:RFD]], but I should mention it is common to keep redirects like these to help people find the closest-related article currently available. Thanks. Hi, {{PAGENAME}}, Congratulations on Becoming a [[Wikipedia:Administrators|Sysop]]!
[[image:Original_Barnstar.png|right]] Hey there. I'm pleased to let you know that, consensus being reached, you are now an [[Wikipedia:Administrators|administrator]]! You've volunteered to do housekeeping duties that normal users sadly cannot participate in. Sysops can't do a lot of stuff: They can't delete pages just like that (except patent nonsense like "aojt9085yu8;3ou"), and they can't protect pages in an edit war they are involved in. But they can delete random junk, block anonymous vandals, delete pages listed on [[Wikipedia:articles for deletion|articles for deletion]] for more than 5 days (provided there's a consensus), protect pages when asked to, and keep the few [[Wikipedia:protected page|protected page]]s that exist on Wikipedia up to date. Almost anything you can do can be undone, but please take a look at '''[[Wikipedia:Administrators' how-to guide|The Administrators' how-to guide]]''' and the '''[[Wikipedia:Administrators' reading list|Administrators' reading list]]''' before you get started (although you ''should'' have read that during your candidacy ;). Take a look before experimenting with your [[superhero|powers]]. Also, please add [[Wikipedia:Administrators' noticeboard|Administrators' noticeboard]] to your watchlist, as there are always discussions/requests for admins there. If you have any questions drop me a message at [[User talk:Nichalp|My talk page]]. Have fun! [[user:Nichalp|=Nichalp]] [[User Talk:Nichalp|«Talk»=]]
 PS Please add you name to [[WP:LA]]!

If I haven't found any acceptable references within a week the article should of course be deleted.--[[User:Anna.h.bauer|Anna.h.bauer]] 18:30, 12 May 2007 (UTC) == RE: Semi'd [[Google Search]] == You wrote on [[User talk:JFreeman|my talk page]]: :I have [[WP:PROT|semi protected]] [[Google search]] for 1 week to deal with the IP hopping link spammer. After 1 week if they return, please report to [[WP:RFPP]]. Thank you for that. Hopefully, it will slow them down, but they've been vandalizing some of the other search engine pages, too. I'll keep an eye out just in case. Thanks again...Joe --[[User:JFreeman|'''JFreeman''']] [[User talk:JFreeman|''(talk)'']] 18:22, 11 May 2007 (UTC) == Black Listed website == my website address is http://redspike101.net.tf/ and when i try changing the link to it i just get a page saying it is black listed why help me out [[User:RedSpike101|RedSpike101]] 18:22, 12 May 2007 (UTC) : On the [[:meta:Spam blacklist|Spam blacklist]], you will see \bnet\.tf\b which is a rule for blocking everything in net.tf. This was likely done because other people using that hosting company have been spamming Wikipedia with links to their sites. You ''could'' try to lodge an appeal and get your site exampted here: [[:meta:Talk:Spam_blacklist#Proposed_removals]] but its probably just easier to either list your site in plain text as you have done, or find hosting on a site that is not blacklisted. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 19:21, 12 May 2007 (UTC) == Gabeyg == I think {{vandal|Gabeyg}} has not learned his lessons. See [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk%3AGabeyg&diff=130538207&oldid=130473330]. I'd like to request that you reconsider the decision to unblock him. --[[User:Nlu|Nlu]] ([[User talk:Nlu|talk]]) 15:12, 13 May 2007 (UTC) : That's not... encouraging. I've decided to leave them another warning and let the original unblock duration stand. If they start misbehaving once the block expires they can always be re-blocked. Most of this seems immature, not malicious. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 18:14, 13 May 2007 (UTC) :I feel really bad that you think me that I did not learn lesson and that I'm vandals. Sorry.. But, although messsages were rough.., I'm just trying to inform you. Well.. Also, I will never talk to my friends about problems in Wikipedia. (So that I will not be suspected as puppetry...)--[[User:Gabeyg|Gabeyg]] 20:59, 13 May 2007 (UTC) == mates block == my mate has been blocked for useing wikipedia as a chat client i cant see why on his controbutions his account is [[User:Pap crap]] have a look thanks [[User:RedSpike101|RedSpike101]] 14:58, 14 May 2007 (UTC) : Actually if you look at his contributions: [[Special:Contributions/Pap crap]] you'd see he's only used Wikipedia for making his user page and having conversations with others. Using neat-o admin tools I could also find one deleted edit, in which he created the article [[Interflash]] but the only text was "interflash". So it looks like he was using Wikipedia as a chat site or personal web host. I will leave him a message explaining things. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 21:48, 14 May 2007 (UTC) == House of the Faun == {| class="messagebox standard-talk" |- |[[Image:Updated DYK query.svg|15px|Updated DYK query]] |'''[[:Template:Did you know|Did you know?]]''' was updated. On [[16 May]], [[2007]], a fact from the article '''[[House of the Faun]]''', which you recently nominated, has been featured in that section on the [[Main Page]]. If you know of another interesting fact from a recently created article, then please suggest it on the [[:Template talk:Did you know|Did you know? talk page]]. |} --'''[[User:Howcheng|howcheng]]''' {[[User talk:Howcheng|chat]]} 06:20, 16 May 2007 (UTC) == Help == Sometime ago, I reported some problems with the [[Kayastha]] article with regards to a vandal. You decided that the person was not a vandal in the strict sense and I sort of left the article to him. Since then . . . uh, well, things have gone from bad to worse. The talk page is here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talk:Kayastha and you can see that the individual who has decided to be the main editor of the page has chosen not to listen to any advice that suggests he should not use POV or OR material in the articles. Can you maybe talk to him and try to let him know that an encyclopedia is not the place for voicing his religious views at the expense of encyclopedia articles? I have been accused of "sinning" by this user several times when I try to remove POV text. [[User:70.186.172.75|70.186.172.75]] 15:13, 16 May 2007 (UTC) == INTERFlash == Dont delete interflash it is a good page and his first good page if you delete it he will not be very happy. [[User:RedSpike101|RedSpike101]] 19:05, 16 May 2007 (UTC) == Unfair Delition == I would like to inform you that my user page,temples,userboxes,barnstars,etc. was delited by [[User:Jeffrey O. Gustafson/Shazaam|Shazaam]]. I feel that this action is unfair. Shazaam claims that my userpage needs to be simple but I find that I need a advanced userpage to help wikipedia in a more advanced way. I have gave a warning to Shazaam for the unfair delition. Cordially, --[[User:ISOLA'd ELBA|ISOLA'd ELBA]] 19:51, 17 May 2007 (UTC) : Actually it was {{ut|Jeffrey O. Gustafson}} who deleted them. If you want them undeleted, you could try at [[WP:DRV|deletion review]]. If you try that, I suggest you be calm, polite, and explain how restoring your user pages will be of benefit to the encyclopedia. I also note you have a general page blanking warning to him; you may wish to see [[WP:DTTR|"Don't template the regulars"]]. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 20:41, 17 May 2007 (UTC) == My AfR == Thanks for letting me know. Since I don't really care about being an admin and since I don't much care what people think of me, I won't be disputing anything. I said my piece, if people got happy from taking gratuitous shots then good for them. [[User:Otto4711|Otto4711]] 21:49, 17 May 2007 (UTC) == Re: [[:Wikipedia:Requests for adminship/Otto4711|Otto4711's RfA]] == Hello! I tidied up the closure of the above RfA, with the header, footer and transcluding on the list of failed RfA candidates too. Regards, [[User talk:(aeropagitica)|(aeropagitica)]] 21:53, 17 May 2007 (UTC) == Vista Logo == i used the vista logo on one of my user page themes and it got changed to a © why? [[User:RedSpike101|RedSpike101]] 19:10, 19 May 2007 (UTC) : The image you were using, [[:Image:Winvista.png]], is copyrighted. Wikipedia is allowed to use it under a [[WP:FAIR|fair use copyright exemption]], which allows it to be used for discussing Vista in articles. Fair use does NOT extend to decorative uses, such as templates and user pages. Some bot patrolled for copyright infringing uses, such as that one and fixed it with a non-infringing version. Also, in the future it would be nice to provide a [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User%3ARedSpike101%2Fvista&diff=131960139&oldid=128858976 diff] so I don't need to go hunting for what you're talking about. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 19:42, 19 May 2007 (UTC) == Star size == Hi, [[Image:Morgan-Keenan spectral classification.png|right|300px]] This image does not appear to represent that size of different star types (red giants are much larger than the Sun, ect). Could you explain that in the image? Thanks. --[[User:Wasted Sapience|Wasted Sapience]] 00:16, 23 May 2007 (UTC) : These are all [[main sequence]] stars. This is to scale (though not properly brightness-scaled). The small red ones are [[red dwarf star|red dwarves]]. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 03:12, 23 May 2007 (UTC) == A proposal re: Vandalism Templates== Hi there! I noticed that you recently warned a user who is inserting comments such as "is openly gay" with the {{subst:uw-defamatory}} template. I'm hoping that you will consider using {{subst:uw-vandalism}} or {{subst:uw-test}} templates instead, because the labelling of such vandalism as defamatory reinforces the idea that being thought of as gay is a bad thing. Thanks for your consideration!--[[User:Xnuala|Xnuala]] ([[User talk:Xnuala|talk]])([[Wikipedia:Editor review/Xnuala|Review]]) 01:51, 23 May 2007 (UTC) : While I sympathize with your assertion that an accusation of homosexuality should not be considered defamatory, in common usage, as in this case, it often is. The {{tl|uw-test}} is for edits which might be accidental. And while it is almost certainly vandalism, {{tl|uw-defamatory}} allows for the possiblity that the edit is true, just unsourced. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 03:22, 23 May 2007 (UTC) ::What about using {{uw-vandalism}}?I won't push the issue, but by confirming the vandal's intentions to use the words "gay" as an insult it contributes to the continued perception of it being a bad thing.--[[User:Xnuala|Xnuala]] ([[User talk:Xnuala|talk]])([[Wikipedia:Editor review/Xnuala|Review]]) 03:30, 23 May 2007 (UTC) ::: That's a reasonable option, but since they intended to defame, I picked the obvious response. I'm not going to second-guess myself just to be [[political correctness|PC]]. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 03:36, 23 May 2007 (UTC) :::: Completely fair. Thanks for your responses!--[[User:Xnuala|Xnuala]] ([[User talk:Xnuala|talk]])([[Wikipedia:Editor review/Xnuala|Review]]) 03:41, 23 May 2007 (UTC) == Release the protection.. == Please release the protection of the discussion page of 63.135.11.194 page. I want to say a lots of things. This time, really, I didn't touch the tags. I promise I will NEVER do that. Last contribution was to redirect User:Gabeyg to AirFrance358. It wasn't tag that I touched. Also, it is same person. I moved. (If you see in ID changing place, you will see me...) — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/66.186.86.156|66.186.86.156]] ([[User talk:66.186.86.156|talk]]) 17:18, 23 May 2007 : If I were to unprotect that page, your past behavior suggests you would place unblock notices which do not provide a valid rationale for unblocking. This would make you show up in [[:Category:Requests for unblock]] and other admins would need to waste their time evaluating the situation before they come to the same conclusion as several of us already have: That your block is justified because of continued interference with sock tags after warnings. The IP block and talk page protection expire in about 4 days. Once that happens you may petition to get {{ul|AirFrance358}} unblocked, but note that continued protestation that the block was unfair will likely not help, as you have had many warnings. Your best bet to staying unblocked is to agree to not touch those tags and instead petition for their removal by others through [[WP:ANI]]. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 20:55, 23 May 2007 (UTC) == Delete help == thanks for that it was very helpful i just did a bit of looking around and found this article it is now delted but i copyed the text have a look did i ad the right tag [[User:RedSpike101/testpage]] 19:10, 19 May 2007 (UTC) == Thanks == I Have Talked to him and he changed his password and cant remember what he changed it to so he created [[User:Pap_Crap2]]. i have added that he is blocked to his accont. 10:14, 25 May 2007 (UTC) == Admin coaching. == I would like to know what you think of the possibility of me submitting an RfA, and whether you would be prepared to coach me. I noticed your name was added to the coach list recently. '''[[user:joshuajohnlee|Joshua John Lee]]''' 19:44, 24 May 2007 (UTC) : I think if you submitted an RfA right now it would go down in flames. This is because you have 328 edits on this account. Generally people don't have a good chance of passing until they have at least a couple thousand edits. Try not to get discouraged, its just that since admins can cause so much trouble if they apply policy incorrectly, people generally want to see some experience applying policy. This generally means edits to [[WP:XFD|deletion debates]], [[WP:AIV|vandal-blocking reports]] or [[WP:ANI|the admin noticeboard]]. You mayalso wish to read [[Wikipedia:Guide to requests for adminship]]. If you're serious about being an admin, I suggest you try contributing to some of those areas. In the mean time, feel free to contact me with any questions. Also it may seem trivial, but some people might oppose you because at present, your signature takes up too much space in markup. A good rule of thumb is 3 lines absolute maximum (240 characters), yours is 408 characters. Anyway, for now I'd be willing to do some informal coaching, but it would help if you can round up a co-coach. [[User:Dgies|'''—dgies''']][[User talk:Dgies|t]][[Special:Contributions/Dgies|c]] 20:31, 24 May 2007 (UTC) :: Thank you for the advice. I have begun to comment on AfD discussions, and will look into the other things later. I have also reduced my signature. '''[[user:joshuajohnlee|Josh]]''' 11:36, 25 May 2007 (UTC) ::: Apologies for the editing mistake. '''[[user:joshuajohnlee|Josh]]''' 10:30, 26 May 2007 (UTC) == Abuse of unblock requests == Please note that within a short time of you [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk:Throw&diff=133356507&oldid=133356093 blocking] [[User:Throw]] from editing their Talk page, due to abuse of the request unblock system, [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk:Mais_oui%21&diff=133406275&oldid=133405849 they e-mailed an unblock request], which User:Nick, rather amazingly, responded to. User:Nick was therefore the 4th Admin that had had to deal with this case. --[[User:Mais oui!|Mais oui!]] 14:15, 25 May 2007 (UTC) : What a [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Log&type=block&page=User:Mais_oui%21 mess], but stuff like [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk%3ANick&diff=133416901&oldid=132548968 this] is not likely to get you any satisfaction. Better to just move on. title: User talk:Cameron Bruce
content: ==You are a wanker== ==Get a life dickhead== Leave the vandalism of pages such as the Cameron Bruce page for places other than Wikipedia. What you get out of doing something so pointless, I have no idea. [[User:124.182.112.72|124.182.112.72]] 06:12, 13 June 2007 (UTC)Rusty8 {{#if:{{{header|}}}|=={{{header-text|[[:Brendan day]]}}}==}} A tag has been placed on [[:Brendan day]], requesting that it be [[WP:CSD|speedily deleted]] from Wikipedia. This has been done because the page appears to have no meaningful content or history, and the text is unsalvageably incoherent. If you think that this notice was placed here in error, you may contest the deletion. To do this, add {{tl|hangon}} on the top of the page (just below the existing speedy deletion or "db" tag) and leave a note on the page's talk page explaining your position. Please do not remove the speedy deletion tag yourself. If the page you created was a test, please use the [[Wikipedia:Sandbox|sandbox]] for any other experiments you would like to do. Feel free to leave a message on my talk page if you have any questions about this. [[User:oysterguitarist|oysterguitarist]]~[[User talk:oysterguitarist|Talk]] 01:00, 19 June 2007 (UTC) == June 2007 == * {{{icon|[[Image:Information.svg|25px]] }}}Please refrain from making unconstructive edits to Wikipedia{{{{{subst|}}}#if:FAV|, as you did to [[:FAV]]}}. Your edits appear to be [[Wikipedia:Vandalism|vandalism]] and have been [[Help:Reverting|reverted]]. If you would like to experiment, please use the [[Wikipedia:Sandbox|sandbox]]. {{{{{subst|}}}#if:Please do not add nonsense to articles. This includes adding inappropriate deletion tags to articles such as [[God]] or [[Religion]], as you have done.|Please do not add nonsense to articles. clade [[Hypsogastropoda]]
clade [[Neogastropoda]] | superfamilia = [[Muricoidea]] | familia = [[Volutidae]] | genus = ''[[Alcithoe]]'' | species = '''''A. fissurata''''' | binomial = ''Alcithoe fissurata'' | binomial_authority = [[Richard Dell|Dell]], 1963 | synonyms = ''Pachymelon fissurata'' [[Richard Dell|Dell]], 1963 }} '''''Alcithoe fissurata''''' is a [[species]] of sea [[snail]], a [[marine (ocean)|marine]] [[gastropod]] [[mollusc]] in the [[family (biology)|family]] [[Volutidae]], the volutes. ==References== {{reflist}} * [[Arthur William Baden Powell|Powell A W B]], ''New Zealand Mollusca'', [[HarperCollins|William Collins Publishers Ltd]], Auckland, New Zealand 1979 ISBN 0-00-216906-1 {{Volutidae-stub}} [[Category:Volutidae]] [[Category:Gastropods of New Zealand]]

title: User talk:Aqsa Khan
content:
== Welcome! ==
'''Welcome, {{BASEPAGENAME}}!
---- I'm {{#ifeq:Riley Huntley|default| [[User:Riana|Riana]]|[[User:Riley Huntley|Riley Huntley]]}}, and I noticed that you haven't been welcomed yet, so I thought I'd drop you a note. We do have a lot of users, and are currently working on {{NUMBEROFARTICLES}} articles, so things can be a little intimidating... but don't worry! We love to help out, and we'll try our best to make your stay here as comfortable as possible.
Here are a few links I found useful when I first arrived here:- {{multicol}} *[[Wikipedia:Be bold in updating pages|'''Be Bold!''']] *[[Wikipedia:Please do not bite the newcomers|Don't let grumpy users scare you off]] *[[Wikipedia:List of policies|Policies]], [[Wikipedia:List of guidelines|guidelines]], and [[Wikipedia:Simplified Ruleset|rules]] *How to [[Help:Starting a new page|create a page]], [[Wikipedia:How to edit a page|edit a page]] and [[Wikipedia:How to write a great article|write a great article]] *[[Wikipedia:FAQ|Who, what, why?]] *A handy [[Wikipedia:Tutorial|tutorial]], and a [[Wikipedia:Picture tutorial|picture tutorial]] {{multicol-break}} *[[Wikipedia:Manual of Style|Writing well]] *[[Wikipedia:Avoiding common mistakes|Learn from others]] *[[Wikipedia:Wikiquette|Play nicely with others]] *[[Wikipedia:Contributing to Wikipedia|Contribute, Contribute, Contribute!]] *[[Wikipedia:User page|Tell us about yourself]] *Be inspired by [[Wikipedia:Featured content|our finest!]] {{multicol-end}} You should sign your name on talk pages, discussions and votes by typing ~~~~; our software automatically converts it to your username and the date. Also, if you don't want to jump right into editing articles right now, why not check out the [[Wikipedia:Sandbox|sandbox]]? Feel free to make test edits there. I know it's a lot of information, but there are two more things I recommend you take note of while editing Wikipedia - [[Wikipedia:Attribution|cite references wherever possible]], and [[Wikipedia:Neutral point of view|avoid allowing personal biases interfere with your editing]]. I hope you enjoy editing and being a [[Wikipedia:Wikipedians|Wikipedian]] - I definitely do. Although we all make mistakes, please keep in mind '''[[Wikipedia:What Wikipedia is not|what Wikipedia is not]]'''. If you have any questions or problems, leave me a message on '''{{#ifeq:Riley Huntley|default| [[User_talk:Riana|my talk page]]|[[User_talk:Riley Huntley|my talk page]]}}''', and I'll try my best to help. Otherwise, please come to the '''[[Wikipedia:New contributors' help page|New contributors' help page]]''', where experienced Wikipedians can answer any queries you have! Or, you can just type '''{{helpme}}''' on your user page, and someone will show up shortly to answer your questions. We hope you stick around, and make sure you enjoy yourself! Cheers, {{ #ifeq: '''-- Cheers, [[User:Riley Huntley|Ri]]''l''[[User talk:Riley Huntley|ey]]''' 07:45, 21 December 2012 (UTC) | default | [[User:WelcomerBot|WelcomerBot]] ([[User talk:WelcomerBot|talk]]) 07:45, 21 December 2012 (UTC) | '''-- Cheers, [[User:Riley Huntley|Ri]]''l''[[User talk:Riley Huntley|ey]]''' 07:45, 21 December 2012 (UTC) }}

title: User talk:Matt Paquette
content: ==[[:Yann Kennedy]]== [[Image:Copyright-problem.svg|left|40px]] This is an automated message from [[User:CorenSearchBot|CorenSearchBot]]. I have performed a web search with the contents of [[:Yann Kennedy]], and it appears to be a substantial copy of http://www.purevolume.com/YannKennedy. It is possible that the bot is confused and found similarity where none actually exists. If that is the case, you can remove the tag from the article. The article will be reviewed to determine if there are any copyright issues. If substantial content is duplicated and it is not [[Wikipedia:Public domain|public domain]] or available under a compatible license, it will be deleted. For legal reasons, we cannot accept copyrighted text or images borrowed from other web sites or printed material. You may use such publications as a source of information, but not as a source of sentences. See our [[Wikipedia:Copyrights|copyright policy]] for further details. (If you own the copyright to the previously published content and wish to donate it, see [[Wikipedia:Donating copyrighted materials]] for the procedure.) [[User:CorenSearchBot|CorenSearchBot]] ([[User talk:CorenSearchBot|talk]]) 16:20, 6 October 2010 (UTC) ==[[Wikipedia:Criteria for speedy deletion|Speedy deletion]] nomination of [[:Yann Kennedy]]== [[Image:Icon delete.svg|60px|left]] A tag has been placed on [[:Yann Kennedy]] requesting that it be speedily deleted from Wikipedia. This has been done under [[WP:CSD#G12|section G12 of the criteria for speedy deletion]], because the article appears to be a clear [[Wikipedia:Copyrights|copyright]] infringement. For legal reasons, we cannot accept copyrighted text or images borrowed from other web sites or printed material, and as a consequence, your addition will most likely be deleted. You may use external websites as a source of ''information'', but not as a source of ''sentences''. This part is crucial: ''say it in your own words''. If the external website belongs to you, and you want to allow Wikipedia to use the text — which means allowing other people to modify it — then you ''must'' verify that externally by one of the processes explained at [[Wikipedia:Donating copyrighted materials]]. If you are not the owner of the external website but have permission from that owner, see [[Wikipedia:Requesting copyright permission]]. You might want to look at [[Wikipedia:Policies and guidelines|Wikipedia's policies and guidelines]] for more details, or ask a question [[Wikipedia:Help desk|here]]. If you think that this notice was placed here in error, you may contest the deletion by adding {{tl|hangon}} to '''the top of [[:Yann Kennedy|the page that has been nominated for deletion]]''' (just below the existing speedy deletion or "db" tag - if no such tag exists then the page is no longer a speedy delete candidate and adding a hangon tag is unnecessary), coupled with adding a note on '''[[Talk:Yann Kennedy|the talk page]]''' explaining your position, but be aware that once tagged for ''speedy'' deletion, if the page meets the criterion, it may be deleted without delay. Please do not remove the speedy deletion tag yourself, but don't hesitate to add information to the page that would render it more in conformance with Wikipedia's policies and guidelines. [[User:Acather96|Acather96]] ([[User talk:Acather96|talk]]) 16:38, 6 October 2010 (UTC) ==[[Wikipedia:Criteria for speedy deletion|Speedy deletion]] nomination of [[:Yann Kennedy]]== [[Image:Icon delete.svg|60px|left]] A tag has been placed on [[:Yann Kennedy]] requesting that it be speedily deleted from Wikipedia. This has been done under [[WP:CSD#A1|section A1 of the criteria for speedy deletion]], because it is a very short article providing little or no context to the reader. Please see [[Wikipedia:Stub#Essential information about stubs|Wikipedia:Stub]] for our minimum information standards for short articles. Also please note that articles must be on [[Wikipedia:Notability|notable]] subjects and should provide references to [[Wikipedia:Reliable sources|reliable sources]] that [[Wikipedia:Verifiability|verify]] their content. You may wish to consider using a Wizard to help you create articles - see the [[Wikipedia:Article wizard2.0|Article Wizard]]. If you think that this notice was placed here in error, you may contest the deletion by adding {{tl|hangon}} to '''the top of [[:Yann Kennedy|the page that has been nominated for deletion]]''' (just below the existing speedy deletion or "db" tag - if no such tag exists then the page is no longer a speedy delete candidate and adding a hangon tag is unnecessary), coupled with adding a note on '''[[Talk:Yann Kennedy|the talk page]]''' explaining your position, but be aware that once tagged for ''speedy'' deletion, if the page meets the criterion, it may be deleted without delay. Please do not remove the speedy deletion tag yourself, but don't hesitate to add information to the page that would render it more in conformance with Wikipedia's policies and guidelines. Hello, Zippydude! [[Wikipedia:Welcoming committee/Welcome to Wikipedia|Welcome]] to Wikipedia! Thank you for [[Special:Contributions/Zippydude|your contributions]] to this free encyclopedia. If you decide that you need help, check out ''Getting Help'' below, ask me on [[User talk:TTGL|my talk page]], or place '''{{tl|helpme}}''' on your talk page and ask your question there. Please remember to [[Wikipedia:Signatures|sign your name]] on talk pages by clicking [[Image:Signature icon.png]] or using four tildes (~~~~); this will automatically produce your username and the date. Finally, please do your best to always fill in the [[Help:Edit summary|edit summary]] field. Below are some useful links to facilitate your involvement. Happy editing! Getting started

Policies and guidelines
|- | style="color:#000"| * [[Wikipedia:Neutral point of view|Neutral point of view]] • [[Wikipedia:No original research|No original research]] * [[Wikipedia:Verifiability|Verifiability]] • [[Wikipedia:Reliable sources|Reliable sources]] • [[Wikipedia:Citing sources|Citing sources]] * [[Wikipedia:What Wikipedia is not|What Wikipedia is not]] • [[Wikipedia:Biographies of living persons|Biographies of living persons]]
* [[Wikipedia:List of policies|List of policies]] • [[Wikipedia:Three-revert rule|Three-revert rule]] • [[Wikipedia:Sock puppetry|Sock puppetry]] * [[Wikipedia:Copyrights|Copyrights]] • [[Wikipedia:Non-free content|Policy for non-free content]] • [[Wikipedia:Image use policy|Image use policy]] * [[Wikipedia:External links|External links]] • [[Wikipedia:Spam|Spam]] • [[Wikipedia:Vandalism|Vandalism]] • [[Wikipedia:List of guidelines|List of guidelines]] * [[Wikipedia:Deletion policy|Deletion policy]] • [[Wikipedia:Conflict of interest|Conflict of interest]] • [[Wikipedia:Notability|Notability]] |- |} |class="MainPageBG" style="width: 55%; border:1px solid #FFFFFF; background-color:#F5FFFA; vertical-align:top"| {| width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="5" style="vertical-align:top; background-color:#F5FFFA" !
The community
|- |style="color:#000"| * [[Wikipedia:Consensus|Build consensus]] • [[Wikipedia:Dispute resolution|Resolve disputes]] * [[Wikipedia:Assume good faith|Assume good faith]] • [[Wikipedia:Civility|Civility]] • [[Wikipedia:Etiquette|Etiquette]] * [[Wikipedia:No personal attacks|No personal attacks]] • [[Wikipedia:No legal threats|No legal threats]]
* [[Wikipedia:Community portal|Community portal]] • [[Wikipedia:Village pump|Village pump]] * [[Wikipedia:Wikipedia Signpost|Signpost]] • [[Wikipedia:IRC channels|IRC channels]] • [[Wikipedia:Mailing lists|Mailing lists]] |- !
Writing articles
|- |style="color:#000"| * [[Wikipedia:Be bold|Be bold in editing]] • [[Wikipedia:Article development|Develop an article]] * [[Wikipedia:The perfect article|The perfect article]] • [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style|Manual of style]] * [[Wikipedia:Stub|Stubs]] • [[Wikipedia:Categorization|Categories]] • [[Wikipedia:Disambiguation|Disambiguation]] * [[Wikipedia:Pages needing attention|Pages needing attention]] • [[Wikipedia:Peer review|Peer review]] |- !
Miscellaneous
|- |style="color:#000"| * [[Wikipedia:Username policy|User name]] • [[Wikipedia:User page|User pages]] • [[Wikipedia:Talk page|Talk pages]] * Clean up: [[Wikipedia:Cleanup|General]] • [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Spam|Spam]] • [[Wikipedia:Cleaning up vandalism|Vandalism]] * [[Wikipedia:WikiProject|Join a WikiProject]] • [[Wikipedia:Translation|Translation]] * [[Wikipedia:Template messages|Useful templates]] • [[Wikipedia:Tools|Tools]] • [[Wikipedia:WikiProject User scripts|User scripts]] |- |} |} |} == [[Sergei Prokofiev]] == Hello Zippydude. I just found [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Sergei_Prokofiev&action=historysubmit&diff=343741314&oldid=343504918 this edit], and I have one question. Do you plan to add similar information also to the rest of biographies of dead people here on Wikipedia? Jesus Christ would be 2010 years old today :) If Prokofiev was alive in 2011, he would be 120 years old, so do you intend to change the information every year? I suggest to revert this edit, as I consider it ...well, illogical? Thank you for your consideration. Have a nice day. --[[User:Vejvančický|Vejvančický]] ([[User talk:Vejvančický|talk]]) 15:22, 13 February 2010 (UTC)

'''Manticao''' is a fourth class [[Philippine municipality|municipality]] in the [[Philippine province|province]] of [[Misamis Oriental]], [[Philippines]]. According to the 2010 census, it has a population of 26,786 people in  6,018 households.

Manticao River was known as '''Naawan River''' until 1957, when it was renamed.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://lawph.com/statutes/ra1756.html|title=An Act Changing the Name of Naawan River in the Municipality of Manticao, Province of Misamis Oriental, to Manticao River|publisher=LawPH.com|accessdate=2011-04-12}}</ref>

==Geography==
Manticao's geographical features consist of mountainous to flat plains to shorelines.

==Demographics==
{{Philippine Census |align=none
| title = Population census of Manticao
| 1990 = 21443
| 1995 = 22630

title: The Companion Guide to Rome
content:
'''''The Companion Guide to Rome''''' is a composition for [[string trio]] by the American composer [[Andrew Norman (composer)|Andrew Norman]].  The complete work was first performed on May 30, 2010 by the Scharoun Ensemble at Radialsystem V in [[Berlin]].<ref name="Score">[[Andrew Norman (composer)|Norman, Andrew]] (2010). [http://andrewnormanmusic.com/archives/45 ''The Companion Guide to Rome'']. Retrieved December 25, 2015.</ref>  The composition was a finalist for the 2012 [[Pulitzer Prize for Music]].<ref>{{cite web |last=Berger |first=Kevin |title=Composer Andrew Norman's imagination has taken residence |work=[[Los Angeles Times]] |date=September 22, 2012 |url=http://articles.latimes.com/2012/sep/22/entertainment/la-et-cm-andrew-norman-20120930 |accessdate=December 25, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Oteri |first=Frank J. |title=KEVIN PUTS WINS 2012 PULITZER PRIZE |work=[[NewMusicBox]] |date=April 16, 2012 |url=http://www.newmusicbox.org/articles/wins-2012-pulitzer-prize/ |accessdate=December 25, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last=Sirota |first=Nadia |title=Bonus Track: "Sabina" from The Companion Guide to Rome by Andrew Norman |publisher=[[WQXR-FM]] |date=August 12, 2014 |url=http://www.wqxr.org/#!/story/bonus-track-sabina-em-companion-guide-romeem-andrew-norman/ |accessdate=December 25, 2015}}</ref>

==Composition==
===Structure===
''The Companion Guide to Rome'' has a duration of roughly 30 minutes and is composed in nine [[Movement (music)|movements]]:
#Teresa
#Benedetto
#Susanna
#Pietro
#Ivo
#Cemente
#Lorenzo
#Cecilia
#Sabina

The ninth movement, "Sabina," was originally composed as a standalone piece in 2006 for the [[Janaki String Trio]].  It can be performed separately or as part of the complete work.<ref name="Score" />

===Inspiration===
The title of the work comes from the eponymous 1965 guidebook to [[Rome]] by [[Georgina Masson]].  The movements thus commemorate nine of Norman's favorite [[Churches of Rome|Roman churches]] mentioned in the text.  Norman wrote in the score program note:{{quote|Like many of the buildings in Rome, this piece is the product of a long gestation marked by numerous renovations, accretions, and ground-up reconstructions. What has emerged is a collection of portraits—nine in all—of my favorite Roman churches. The music is, at different times and in different ways, informed by the proportions of the churches, the qualities of their surfaces, the patterns in their floors, the artwork on their walls, and the lives and legends of the saints whose names they bear. The more I worked on these miniatures, the less they had to do with actual buildings and the more they became character studies of imaginary people, my companions for a year of living in the Eternal City.<ref name="Score" />}}

title: User talk:Bt106
content:
[[Image:Gartoon-Bluefish-icon.png|30px]] Welcome to Wikipedia! I'm glad you want to get involved, but I'm afraid there's a problem with the article you created, [[:Eddie towns]]. It did not indicate how or why the subject is [[WP:N|notable]], that is, why an article about that subject should be included in Wikipedia. Don't feel too badly; lots of people have a little trouble when creating their first article. You might find it useful to read [[WP:FIRST|Your First Article]] for some good advice about starting to create articles on Wikipedia. Two important rules of thumb are: Avoid [[WP:COI| writing about yourself]], your business, your family and friends, or your web page, and avoid writing about anything that hasn't been written about in [[WP:RS|reliable sources]] like books, newspapers, and magazines. Anyway, don't be discouraged. I've deleted the article you created, and feel free to ask me if you have any more questions. If I've made a mistake, and this article really is about a subject that meets the [[WP:N|notability criteria]], then please let me know my leaving me [[User talk:FisherQueen|a message]] and links to at least three newspaper articles, magazine articles, or books that have been written about the subject, and I'll be glad to undelete it, and even add the sources so no other patroller makes the same mistake. -[[User:FisherQueen|FisherQueen]] ([[User talk:FisherQueen|talk]] · [[Special:Contributions/FisherQueen|contribs]]) 21:40, 29 March 2009 (UTC) == March 2009 == [[Image:Information.svg|25px]] Please refrain from introducing inappropriate pages{{#if:Eddie towns|, such as [[:Eddie towns]],}} to Wikipedia. Doing so is not in accordance with our [[Wikipedia:List of policies|policies]]. For more information about creating articles, you may want to read [[Wikipedia:Your first article|Your first article]]. If you would like to experiment, please use the [[Wikipedia:Sandbox|sandbox]]. {{#if:|{{{2}}}|Thank you.}} [[User:FisherQueen|FisherQueen]] ([[User talk:FisherQueen|talk]] · [[Special:Contributions/FisherQueen|contribs]]) 21:44, 29 March 2009 (UTC) [[Image:Nuvola apps important.svg|25px]] Please stop. If you continue to introduce inappropriate pages to Wikipedia{{#if:Eddie towns| , such as [[:Eddie towns]]}}, you will be [[Wikipedia:Blocking policy|blocked]] from editing. {{#if:|{{{2}}}|}} [[User:FisherQueen|FisherQueen]] ([[User talk:FisherQueen|talk]] · [[Special:Contributions/FisherQueen|contribs]]) 00:24, 30 March 2009 (UTC) ==Friendly warning== Friend, it's time to stop now. I'm sorry that Wikipedia isn't what you wanted it to be, but you're going to have to create your personal tribute at a different web site. Wikipedia is just an encyclopedia, and it isn't anything else- if you need free web space, you'll need to look elsewhere. I wish you well, but if you aren't interested in writing an encyclopedia, then there's nothing else I can help you with. -[[User:FisherQueen|FisherQueen]] ([[User talk:FisherQueen|talk]] · [[Special:Contributions/FisherQueen|contribs]]) 00:34, 30 March 2009 (UTC) ==AfD nomination of Mickub==
